ServiceChannelStatusField.name: ServiceChannelStatusField
ServiceChannelStatusField.description: Represents the values that you use to indicate completed and in-progress work item status for the status field in the Status-Based Capacity routing model.

ServiceChannelId.description: The ID of the service channel.

Type.description: For the field that you use to track work status, specifies whether the values are for completed or in-progress work.

Value.description: Specifies the values that you use to indicate completed and in-progress work status. Valid values are Completed, InProgress, and Paused.
